code: @Test public void testStringContent() throws Exception {     long start = System.currentTimeMillis().     template.sendBody("direct:in", "Hello Text World\n").     long delta = System.currentTimeMillis() - start.     assertTrue("Delay should be around 2 sec: " + delta, delta > 1900 && delta < 3000). }
protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("direct:in").to("stream:out?delay=2000").         }     }. }
